item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip C100PA-DS03
item.description: The ASUS Flip C100PA-DS03 is a convertible Chromebook with an IPS touchscreen that can be flipped over from 0 to 360 degree so the device can be used as a tablet or laptop.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip C302CA-DHM4
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C302CA-DHM4 is a convertible Chromebook with an IPS touchscreen that can be flipped over from 0 to 360 degree so the device can be used as a tablet or laptop.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C300SA-DS02
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C300SA-DS02 is an 13.3-inch laptop powered by the energy-efficient 1.6 GHz dual-core Intel N3060 processor.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C200MA-DS02
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C200MA-DS02 is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by the energy-efficient 2.16 GHz dual-core Intel Bay Trail N2840 processor.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C202SA-YS01
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C202SA-YS01 is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.6GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N3060 processor. It comes with 2GB RAM and 16 GB eMMC.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C202SA-YS02
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C202SA-YS02 is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.6GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N3060 processor. It comes with 4GB RAM and 16 GB eMMC.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C201PA-DS02
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C201PA-DS02 is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.8GHz quad-core Rockchip 3288-C processor. It comes with 4GB RAM and 16 GB eMMC.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip C100PA-DB02
item.description: The ASUS Flip C100PA-DB02 is a convertible Chromebook with an IPS touchscreen that can be flipped over from 0 to 360 degree so the device can be used as a tablet or laptop.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip C100PA-DB01
item.description: The ASUS Flip C100PA-DB01 is a convertible Chromebook that can be used in laptop and tablet modes. It has a 10.1-inch IPS multi-touch display, is very light weight and offers long battery life.

item.title: ASUS 1015E-DS03
item.description: The ASUS 1015E-DS03 is a low-cost 10.1 inch netbook that's less than 1 inch thin and just weighs 2.64lbs.
